text.text_translated:
Your dreams can show you many things.
They show you what you are thinking about.
Sometimes you do not know you think about these things.

Some dreams are very common.
For example, you dream you can fly or you are falling.
Or you dream your teeth fall out.
Or you have no clothes in a public place.
These dreams often mean a similar thing for most people.

But you need to understand your own dream.
To do this, think about your daily life.
Think about what happens and how you feel.
